name: Always Kill Your Heroes
description:
Don't let them take your treasure!! You need that for interest payments.

Click on slimes to select them and then click on an empty space to move or a hero to attack.

Move the camera using WSAD or the arrow keys.

Press t to toggle the hud

Press r to rebirth a slime (note you can only have 5 slimes at a time)

WIP for Fall 2018 lisp game jam. Written in fennel using love2d.
